DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics inhale Montelukast ( MK-0476 ) participant mild moderate asthma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Inhaled Montelukast ( MK-0476 ) Participants With Mild Moderate Asthma ( MK-0476-380 AM3 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 65 Must mild moderate asthma ( Part III ) Nonsmoker least 6 month History stroke , chronic seizure major neurological disorder You nurse Drink 3 glass alcohol day Have allergy able tolerate lactose Have history drug abuse last 5 year Drink 6 beverage contain caffeine day Have surgery , donate blood participate another investigational study last 4 week
